data.label: Hero Headline
data.content: Your design engineering hobbit, collecting new coordinates.

data.label: Bio - Intro
data.content: Often found with a camera in hand, scavenging for projects to tinker with and great second breakfasts.

data.label: Bio - Current Work
data.content: Currently building {Student Machines|https://studentmachines.com}, a group crafting delightful interfaces around private, local LLMs.

data.label: Bio - Mobbin
data.content: Ran special projects at {Mobbin|https://mobbin.com} as a growth engineer, previously led a national campaign for {Perplexity}.

data.label: Bio - Han River
data.content: I was the sole analyst at {Han River Partners|https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20241022128248/en/HRZ-Han-River-Launches-%24100-Million-Venture-Fund-to-Fuel-Korea-Graph-Tech-Startups}, and was once nominated for {Framer Site of the Year|https://www.framer.com/awards/}.

data.label: Bio - Grants
data.content: Received grants from the teams at {Neo|https://www.forbes.com/sites/richardnieva/2025/04/16/this-tech-incubator-is-harder-to-get-into-than-harvard/} and {1517 Fund|https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2016-12-01/thiel-s-1517-fund-is-stalking-the-next-zuckerberg}, and am a regionally ranked {competitive debater}.

data.label: Clock - Location Description
data.content: A city at the southern tip of Kyushu, where the active volcano Sakurajima looms across the bay. Known for its black pork cuisine, sweet potato shochu, and samurai heritage—the birthplace of the Meiji Restoration.

clock_facts: Sakurajima erupts on average 500 times a year.
Nicknamed the 'Naples of the Eastern World'.
Locals swear by kurobuta — black Berkshire pork.
Sweet potato shochu has been distilled here for 500+ years.
The nearest bullet train station is Kagoshima-Chuo.
